plot: Comedy about 13-year-old Henry who lands a part-time job as Danger Boy, a sidekick in training to super crime fighter Captain Man.
plot_en: Comedy about 13-year-old Henry who lands a part-time job as Danger Boy, a sidekick in training to super crime fighter Captain Man.
plot_es: Comedy about 13-year-old Henry who lands a part-time job as Danger Boy, a sidekick in training to super crime fighter Captain Man.
title: Henry Danger
